article_metadata.title: Curbelo’s stance | Miami Herald

og.description: Reporter Patricia Mazzei gives Republican U.S. Rep. Carlos Curbelo a pretty good score for being bi-partisan, and in truth, he has taken a fair position on a few issues important to South Floridians.
